Palmaz Ahmad
Data Analyst - Student - Martial Artist

About Me

Hobbies

I currently hold a 2nd Degree blackbelt in the Korean Martial art of 'TaekwonDo'. I have over 14 Years of experience in multiple martials arts and disiplines such as Boxing, Kick Boxing, Thai Boxing, Kung Fu, Hapkido, JudoKwan and others. I have 5 years Coaching experience and 10 years Competing Experience. 5 of which was representing Great Britian.

University & Work Experience

Currently on Placment and studying the course 'Computing with a Year in Industry'. I'm currently working at a Global Pharmaceutical company as a Data Analyst in the Global Commercial Team. Working on projects revolving around a divestiture of 2 companies and migrating two different companies together.

Youtube to MP3 - Python

Python script which converts Youtube videos to .MP3 file.

  • Date: 31/12/2019
